original: intros a a0. unfold union_s_prd0. intros s d c pl tl H H0. apply (union_s0d_3 d c pl tl). apply (mpl_compat_0 c pl s H). apply (union_s0d_1_1 d c pl a c pl). apply (mpl_compat_7_1 a pl). apply H. apply H0. apply (mpl_compat_7_1 a0 pl). apply H. apply H0. apply (in_dom_M1 prec_list a pl).
